mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_post_label (parent_id, content,type_img_url,fix_show,type) VALUES
( (SELECT m.ID FROM ( SELECT t_post_label.ID FROM t_post_label WHERE t_post_label.CONTENT = #{parentContent} ) m), #{item},#{labelImg},#{FIX_SHOW},#{TYPE} )

select.if: SELECT a.ID postLabelId, a.PARENT_ID labelParentId, a.CONTENT labelContent, a.TYPE labelTypeId, a.TYPE_IMG_URL labelImg, a.SIZE labelSize, a.FIX_SHOW labelShow FROM t_post_label a WHERE a.CONTENT like CONCAT('%',#{labelContent},'%')

SELECT a.ID postLabelId, a.PARENT_ID labelParentId, a.CONTENT labelContent, a.TYPE labelTypeId, a.TYPE_IMG_URL labelImg, a.SIZE labelSize, a.FIX_SHOW labelShow FROM t_post_label a WHERE a.CONTENT = #{realContent}

SELECT a.ID postLabelId, a.PARENT_ID labelParentId, a.CONTENT labelContent, a.TYPE labelTypeId, a.TYPE_IMG_URL labelImg, a.SIZE labelSize, a.FIX_SHOW labelShow FROM t_post_label a WHERE a.CONTENT = #{contents}
